creator: mats@henricson.se
text:
I tried to create this DailyRollingFileAppender:

DRFA drfa = new DRFA(pl, logFileName, "'.'yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm'.log'");

That doesn't work. It is never rolled. But if I remove the first '.', the it works:

DRFA drfa = new DRFA(pl, logFileName, "yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm'.log'");

I need this so that I can double click on the log in Windows to open it.
".log" is a recognized appendix, while making one for all dates doesn't
work. It is no big deal, since I could work around it, but it is annoying.

This *could* be a bug in SimpleDateFormat, but I haven't checked it.

Mats

creator: ceki@apache.org
text: After testing this, I can say that it works for me.
